def_cn: 感人的;令人感伤（或同情）的
def_en: If something is moving, it makes you feel strongly an emotion such as sadness, pity, or sympathy.

def_cn: (模型或机器部件)活动的，可移动的
def_en: A moving model or part of a machine moves or is able to move.

def_cn: 推动力；起激励作用的人(或事)
def_en: The moving spirit or moving force behind something is the person or thing that caused it to start and to keep going, or that influenced people to take part in it.
